long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
mathilda is a new Gen2.0 ATS (applicant tracking system) for personnel hiring. mathilda prides itself from being socially responsible hiring with emphasis on both interviewer and candidate experience. mathilda does this to increase productivity via automation and to improve the company branding and reputation which none other ATS does.

In this chrome plugin, mathilda allows to experience the candidate hiring experience from authorised users of Naurki platform. mathilda allows them to shortlist, capture candidate information and push it to mathilda to proceed with the hiring process. Through this plugin and automation, this will save the user time to download and upload the same candidate information from and to the systems involved.
